content: learn how to create a stunning crochet hanging vine with delicate flowers in this comprehensive tutorial perfect for adding a touch of natural beauty to your space this step-by-step diy guide will walk you through each stitch and technique discover the joy of crochet as you bring this enchanting project to life suitable for beginners and experienced crocheters alike this tutorial ensures you ll create a masterpiece to adorn your home don t miss out on this captivating crochet adventure start creating your own charming hanging vine today us terminology is used things used 1 crochet hook 3 5mm 2 yarn brand - lovlim cotton yarn green pink grey 3 scissors 4 needle for the free video tutorial refer below link https //youtu be/kp1utx6yr2g
